excerpt.rendered: Vedaone nirgundi capsules helps reduce the generalized pain of body, it helps reduce the swelling and pain of joints. Helps provide healthy eye sight. Helps reduce the generalized pain of body. Helps in stimulating the liver for its healthy secretions. Gives bone joint and knee pain relief . 100 percent natural pain relief capsule which improves joint mobility and soothes muscle spasm.
